General.Name: Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat
General.Description: Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat Taahhüt ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells medium voltage power distribution equipment in Turkey. It offers metal enclosed modular, metal clad, and gas insulated switchgears; and compact transformer substations, medium voltage distribution transformers and switchgear components, and medium voltage cable accessories, as well as production relays. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey. Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat Taahhüt ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Eaton Corporation plc
